channel.title: Rune-Palace - Economy Based
channel.description:
[center]Rune-Palace
Welcome to my official development thread, my plans are to bring back a once loved server but with some minor updates that were much needed to make it able to compete with the rest.
Time-Line: 1. Downloaded Devolution v7, Thank god the link still worked. 2. Downloaded and set-up Galkon's Runelimited client to work with the server. 3. Started working on Prayer a skill not paid much attention to originally on Dodian/Uber. 4. Fixed up home, changed experiance rates and tweaked combat to have correct animations and bonuses. 5. Re-wrote the combat system using my originally made one from my old Delta server. 6. Added global objects, removed large chunks of code from process, and edited the premium member information. 7. Will update
[center][u][i][b]I started this project yesterday and i'm already making quite a good amount of progress, please and I can't state this enough, if you don't like what i'm doing refrain from posting and simply hit the back button, if you support it please post with things you want to see in the server.[/b][/i][/u][/center]
My Goal & Reasoning: The main goal and reason I wanted to make this server is simply because anymore the private server world is full of Spawning Servers, PKing Servers, and Servers with bullshit economies. All I want to do is make a simple yet complicated server which has both a great economy and great community.
[img]http://img821.imageshack.us/img821/7913/specialsx.jpg[/img] [img]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/9767/prayeral.jpg[/img] [img]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/7083/maxtm.jpg[/img] [img]http://img215.imageshack.us/img215/7433/max1nh.jpg[/img] [img]http://img830.imageshack.us/img830/1810/max2tp.jpg[/img] [img]http://img502.imageshack.us/img502/5865/fullscreen.jpg[/img] [img]http://img846.imageshack.us/img846/4092/allcq.jpg[/img] [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/9697/equipmenth.jpg[/img]
[/center]
IN BETA: PM FOR DETAILS

item.title: Rune-Palace - Economy Based
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“Eternal Knights, post:25, topic:423455”][quote author=ranger squad link=topic=526094.msg3833445#msg3833445 date=1322722903]
Whether you use the account or not, you have two accounts which is against the rules. Also, you were the first one to start arguing. Jokes On You made a comment, and then you got involved and became argumentative. Whilst rep has no meaning on this forum anymore, it’s still not something to compare users by, as reputation is literally how it is in real life - the “cool kids”, the troll etc, get rep whilst the other users don’t. And before you say I have the intelligence of a “blind goldfish” (where the fuck did that come from), I suggest you look at yourself.
And also, I stopped usigng this account for a while and made a new account, WHICH GOT BANNED.

Though I would be surprised if you understood anything, you have the intelligence of a blind goldfish.
[/quote]

Lol, I think you got the wrong idea. Me and him were arguing, and YOU got into our business. Second, I wasn’t the one to bring up the reputation shit, go back and read. Stop digging topics and mind your own fucking business.[/quote]

Why should I “mind my own business”? As a forum member, it is my duty to report any rule-breakers to the moderators.

Read full topic
